alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Alachua County through 230 PM EDT... At 202 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms north of Gainesville Airport and Gainesville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Alachua, Hawthorne, Orange Heights, Gainesville Airport, Newnans Lake, Waldo, La Crosse and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
